title: Liam Hemsworth pictured holding hands with mystery woman
text:
It looks like Liam is moving on (Picture: Taylor Hill/FilmMagic)

It looks like Miley Cyrus isn’t the only one moving on from her marriage.

Liam Hemsworth has been pictured holding hands with a mystery woman, two months after he separated from wife of eight months, Miley.

After hiding out in Byron Bay, Australia, for weeks, the 29-year-old was papped in New York City – and he wasn’t alone.

In a picture acquired by TMZ, Liam was seen holding hands with a blonde woman as they walked over a zebra crossing, and we don’t think the actor was just guiding her over the road.

The Hunger Games star was also seen dining at Sant Ambroeus with his date, with the pair sitting outside and enjoying drinks.

Miley is dating Cody Simpson (Picture: Instagram)

Liam kept things low-key in a pair of sunglasses, a navy jacket, jeans and Converse, while his date also wore sunnies with her ripped jeans, printed shirt and ankle boots.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s no surprise that Hemsworth has chosen to get back on the dating scene, considering his ex is onto her second post-marriage relationship.

Miley, 26, was pictured kissing Kaitlynn Carter as news of her split from Liam broke, and the girls went on to date for a month before parting ways.

Now, the We Can’t Stop singer is hooking up with Cody Simpson, even calling the Aussie musician her ‘boyfriend’ after he visited her in hospital while she was recovering from tonsillitis.

Liam has been keeping it low-key since the split (Picture: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images)

Miley has been sharing selfies with her beau all over social media, so we doubt she’ll be too peeved that Liam is out here holding hands with a new girl.

Liam and Miley met on the set of The Last Song in 2009 and got engaged three years later – however, they split up in 2013, with Miley dating Stella Maxwell and Patrick Schwarzenegger and Liam being pictured kissing Eiza Gonzalez.

The draw was too much, though, and the on-off couple got back together in 2016, getting re-engaged the same year.

The couple tied the knot in December 2018 in an intimate ceremony at their home, but just eight months later, they had parted ways.

A rep for Miley said: ‘Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time. Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is what’s best while they both focus on themselves and careers.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart. Please respect their process and privacy.’

Divorce papers have already been filed.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Hemsworth’s rep for comment.

description: Liam Hemsworth is pictured holding hands with mystery woman as he moves on from ex-wife Miley Cyrus, who is dating Cody Simpson.
